TopicTitle: 2 sets of stock command pods issue

Articles.Content:
I recently installed Real Solar system and alot of other mods (new installation from scratch). It all seemed fine until i got into my construction building. i now have 2 stock command modules. When i click on either one the game freeze up and i cant go out or in of the game. Its all right if i click and use another available but modded command module. The same thing happens when i unlocked the mk1 (stock) and tried to use that one.

What kind of mod can provoke this error?

i use KSP.025 64bit.

Installed mods are: AIES Aerospace, Chatterer, CustomBiomes, Environmental Visual Enhancements, FAR, Kethane,KW Rocketry, MechJeb2, Procedural Fairings, Procedural Parts, RealSolarSystem, RemoteTech2, TweakScale, joint reinforcement, infernal robotics, launch countdown, textures for planets.

Welcome to the forums!

Please read the How to Get Support sticky. It's hard to provide support without good information.
